main_definition: Writing is the act of forming letters, words, or symbols on a surface to communicate ideas in written form.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The process of putting thoughts into text.
meanings_and_examples.example: I spent hours writing my research paper.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A piece of literature, such as a novel, short story, or poem.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is an avid reader and has finished several classic novels.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The ability to use words effectively in written form.
meanings_and_examples.example: His writing skills improved significantly after attending a creative writing workshop.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A formal document, such as a letter or an article.
meanings_and_examples.example: I wrote a letter to the editor expressing my opinion on the matter.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The physical act of creating written marks on a surface.
meanings_and_examples.example: He picked up his pen and began writing in his journal.
